content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Good morning,
Please can you help with some detail with regard to planning reference 06/04861/FUL?
Please can you confirm that all the contributions have been paid and the dates in which you received the money? Further, please give details of any money outstanding to the council and also any monies that have been received by the council that have now past the spend deadline.
Thank you for your help.
Yours faithfully,
Polly Barton

Dear Polly Barton,
Thank you for your request for information relating to S106 Financial
Contributions which we received on 15/02/2024.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 14/03/2024. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
Email: [1][Sheffield City Council request email]
This Email, and any attachments, may contain non-public information and is
intended solely for the individual(s) to whom it is addressed. It may
contain sensitive or protectively marked material and should be handled
accordingly. If this Email has been misdirected, please notify the author
immediately. If you are not the intended recipient you must not disclose,
distribute, copy, print or rely on any of the information contained in it
or attached, and all copies must be deleted immediately. Whilst we take
reasonable steps to try to identify any software viruses, any attachments
to this Email may nevertheless contain viruses which our anti-virus
software has failed to identify. You should therefore carry out your own
anti-virus checks before opening any documents. Sheffield City Council
will not accept any liability for damage caused by computer viruses
emanating from any attachment or other document supplied with this e-mail
References
Visible links
1. mailto:[Sheffield City Council request email]

Dear Polly Barton,
Thank you for your request for information relating to S106 Financial
Contributions which we received on 15/02/2024.
Please find Sheffield City Council’s response to your request set out
below:
Under Regulation 8 of the Environmental Information Regulations 2004,
Sheffield City Council charges for this information. Please make your
request to [1][
email address
].
If you have any queries about this response, please do not hesitate to
contact us.
The information provided in this response is available for re-use under
the terms of the Open Government Licence v3.0. The terms of the OGL can be
found [2]here. When re-using the information, Sheffield City Council
requires you to include the following attribution statement: “Contains
public sector information obtained from Sheffield City Council and
licensed under the Open Government Licence v3.0.”
If you are unhappy with the response you have received in relation to your
request, you are entitled to have this reviewed. You can ask for an
internal review by replying to this email. Internal review requests should
be submitted within 40 working days from the date of this response.
If you remain dissatisfied with the outcome of your internal review, you
can contact the Information Commissioner’s Office. Please see
[3]
https://ico.org.uk/make-a-complaint/offi...
for further details.
Kind Regards,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
Email: [4][Sheffield City Council request email]
From: FOI
Sent: Wednesday, February 21, 2024 11:54 AM
To: Polly Barton <[FOI #1086975 email]>
Subject: Re – Freedom of Information Request – Reference – FOI / 1050474
Dear Polly Barton,
Thank you for your request for information relating to S106 Financial
Contributions which we received on 15/02/2024.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 14/03/2024. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ

reasonable steps to try to identify any software viruses, any attachments

email address

5. mailto:[Sheffield City Council request email]

Dear FOI,
Good afternoon, I am in contact with every council in the country and this is the first response that asks for money to provide the answer. Please review my request and confirm your response. This information should be made public and not at a cost.
I am just very surprised.
Thank you for your review.
Yours sincerely,
Polly Barton

Dear Polly Barton,
Thank you for your recent request for an internal review relating to S106
Financial Contributions which we received on 14/03/2024. We are sorry to
hear that you are not happy with your response.
This has now been logged and will be carried out by a member of the team.
The Code of Practice – Environmental Information Regulations 2004 states
that we must respond to your request for internal review within 40 working
days, by 14/05/2024. Please do not hesitate to contact us at the email
address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
Email: [1][Sheffield City Council request email]
This Email, and any attachments, may contain non-public information and is
intended solely for the individual(s) to whom it is addressed. It may
contain sensitive or protectively marked material and should be handled
accordingly. If this Email has been misdirected, please notify the author
immediately. If you are not the intended recipient you must not disclose,
distribute, copy, print or rely on any of the information contained in it
or attached, and all copies must be deleted immediately. Whilst we take
reasonable steps to try to identify any software viruses, any attachments
to this Email may nevertheless contain viruses which our anti-virus
software has failed to identify. You should therefore carry out your own
anti-virus checks before opening any documents. Sheffield City Council
will not accept any liability for damage caused by computer viruses
emanating from any attachment or other document supplied with this e-mail

Visible links

Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please pass this on to the person who conducts Freedom of Information reviews.
I am writing to request an internal review of Sheffield City Council's handling of my FOI request 'S106 Financial Contributions'.
It appears that my request arguing that there should be a cost has been ignored or forgotten.
Thank you.
Yours faithfully,
Polly Barton

Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please pass this on to the person who conducts Freedom of Information reviews.
I am writing to request an internal review of Sheffield City Council's handling of my FOI request 'S106 Financial Contributions'.
My last correspondence, referring to cost has been ignored or forgotten, please could someone look in to this?
Thank you.
Yours faithfully,
Polly Barton
